Please visit the [CDC current recommendations](https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/clinical-considerations/interim-considerations-us.html)if you have questions. We will be carrying the new covid vaccine that comes out in September. The new vaccine won't be released until at the earliest 09/19/23.
